Subject: Cantera beginner needs help!

Hello!  I am currently writing a program in Fortran and I need to 
use the chemical equilibrium routine in Cantera to do some 
calculations.  Unfortunately, my programming knowledge is pretty 
limited.  I realize I need to build and install Cantera from the 
source code in order to link my Fortran program to Cantera.  I 
followed the instructions given in the Powerpoint presentation on 
Cantera's webpage.  I used the source distribution cantera-1.5.5-
src.zip to build the solution.  When I go to build the 
the "SetupCantera" project I get three errors:

C:\cantera-1.5.5\win32\vc7\SetupCantera\SetupCantera.vdproj Unable 
to find source file 'C:\cantera-1.5.5
\Cantera\matlab\cantera\@Kinetics\private\CVS\Entries' for 
file 'Entries', located in '[TARGETDIR]
\MATLAB\toolbox\cantera\@Kinetics\private\CVS', the file may be 
absent or locked.

C:\cantera-1.5.5\win32\vc7\SetupCantera\SetupCantera.vdproj Unable 
to find source file 'C:\cantera-1.5.5
\Cantera\matlab\cantera\@Kinetics\private\CVS\Repository' for 
file 'Repository', located in '[TARGETDIR]
\MATLAB\toolbox\cantera\@Kinetics\private\CVS', the file may be 
absent or locked.

C:\cantera-1.5.5\win32\vc7\SetupCantera\SetupCantera.vdproj Unable 
to find source file 'C:\cantera-1.5.5
\Cantera\matlab\cantera\@Kinetics\private\CVS\Root' for file 'Root', 
located in '[TARGETDIR]
\MATLAB\toolbox\cantera\@Kinetics\private\CVS', the file may be 
absent or locked.

The only files in C:\cantera-1.5.5
\Cantera\matlab\cantera\@Kinetics\private are kinetics_get.m and 
kinetics_set.m, so I suppose something is missing.  Any 
suggestions?  I appreciate the help!

Ryan
